item.title: EPISODE 4 - The Origin of The Triple Feature
item.author: theaterhopper@hotmail.com
item.description: For the first time, Tom Brazelton from Theater Hopper, Joe Dunn from Joe Loves Crappy Movies and Gordon McAlpin from Multiplex gather formally under the banner of "The Triple Feature" in their first weekly installment of movie, comics and pop culture discussion. This week: "Children of Men," the proliferation of aging action stars, and part one of our picks for the movies we're most looking forward to in 2007!

In the second hour Zach Miller from Joe and Monkey and Brandon J. Carr formerly of The Kenmore call in to save my ass. Mitch Clem from San Antonio Rock City was on the line, too - but too much of a wuss to call in.
